title: Textile, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and linen
Technique: plain compound satin weave
dimensions: H x W: 61 x 19 cm (24 in. x 7 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Brocatelle type with pattern of stylized stems and leaves reserved in red satin on a ground of gold produced by extra yellow silk wefts floated over the surface of the red satin.  Main wefts are coarse linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 17th century.Medium: silk and linen
Technique: plain compound satin weave. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-20.
